Asset.Name: scene_environment
Asset.Xml: <root> <SceneEnvironment> <VisibleDistance>500000</VisibleDistance> <FogEnabled>True</FogEnabled> <FogColor> <Vector3> <X>0.75</X> <Y>0.75</Y> <Z>0.75</Z> </Vector3> </FogColor> <FogStartDistance>50000</FogStartDistance> <FogEndDistance>200000</FogEndDistance> <ShadowFadeStartDistance>50</ShadowFadeStartDistance> <ShadowFadeEndDistance>50</ShadowFadeEndDistance> <ShadowCasterDistance>50</ShadowCasterDistance> <BloomAmount>3</BloomAmount> <BloomThreshold>0.9</BloomThreshold> <DynamicRangeEnabled>True</DynamicRangeEnabled> <ExposureAmount>1</ExposureAmount> <DynamicRangeTransitionMaxScale>100</DynamicRangeTransitionMaxScale> <DynamicRangeTransitionMinScale>0.01</DynamicRangeTransitionMinScale> <DynamicRangeTransitionTime>0.5</DynamicRangeTransitionTime> <DynamicRangeSaturationAmount>0.5</DynamicRangeSaturationAmount> <DynamicRangeDarkenAmount>0.1</DynamicRangeDarkenAmount> <DynamicRangeCinematicAmount>0.5</DynamicRangeCinematicAmount> <Gravity>1</Gravity> <EditorIconScale>0.3</EditorIconScale> <EditorMoveScale>3</EditorMoveScale> <EditorRotationScale>4</EditorRotationScale> <EditorDefaultObjectScale>0.1</EditorDefaultObjectScale> </SceneEnvironment> <classes> <SceneEnvironment fullname="SynapseGaming.LightingSystem.Core.SceneEnvironment" assembly="SynapseGaming-SunBurn-Pro" fullyqualifiedname="SynapseGaming.LightingSystem.Core.SceneEnvironment, SynapseGaming-SunBurn-Pro, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=c23c60523565dbfd" /> <Vector3 fullname="Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector3" assembly="Microsoft.Xna.Framework" fullyqualifiedname="Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector3, Microsoft.Xna.Framework, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=842cf8be1de50553" /> </classes> </root>
